# popoverWillClose(_:)

**Instance Method**

Invoked when the popover is about to close.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func popoverWillClose(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Discussion

Invoked on the delegate when the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopover/willCloseNotification] notification is sent.

This method will also be invoked on the delegate’s popover, if the method has been implemented.

## Popover Visibility

- **popoverShouldClose(_:)**: Allows a delegate to override a close request.
- **popoverWillShow(_:)**: Invoked when the popover will show.
- **popoverDidShow(_:)**: Invoked when the popover has been shown.
- **popoverDidClose(_:)**: Invoked when the popover did close.
- **popoverDidDetach(_:)**: Indicates that a popover has been released while it’s in an implicitly detached state.
- **popoverShouldDetach(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a popover should detach from its positioning view and become a separate window.
